name: Nagios LogScat
short_description: Nagios LogScat is a Perl CGI for translating Nagios (2.x) status logs into a useful web interface. It displays a color coded summary of the hosts and services monitored, host fast access table and host details. Edit log path and place in Apache cgi-bin.
